content.text: Hey there! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to watch YouTube videos of other people cooking, but I don't like to cook myself.
I'm the opposite! I love cooking but I don't like watching other people do it.
That's interesting! What's your favorite thing to cook?
I love making homemade pasta. There's something so satisfying about making something from scratch.
That sounds delicious! I've never made homemade pasta before.
You should try it sometime! It's not as hard as you might think.
I might have to give it a try. I'm always looking for new things to cook.
What do you like to do for fun besides watching cooking videos?
I love video games! I play a lot of different games, but my favorite is probably Call of Duty.
I've never played Call of Duty. Is it fun?
It's really fun! It's a first-person shooter game where you can team up with friends to fight against other players.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I might have to check it out sometime.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
